title: Paz y Flora
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Caribbean, Costa Rican
description: Restaurant serving contemporary vegetarian cuisine. Sample menu items include raw veggies with hummus, salads, rice pasta with coconut sauce and mushroom, veggie burgers, fresh fruits drinks, and baked potatoes. Free Wi-Fi and parking.
streetAddress: in Santa Elena, next to Casa Tranquilo hostel
